    		International Student and Scholar Services
    	Supporting International Wildcats at California State University, Chico.Spring 2023 AdvisingFebruary 6 - May 19Monday - ThursdayDrop-in style (prior appointment not required)Virtual: 9:00 –11:00 am - use link belowIn-person: 1:00 - 3:00 pm  - SSC 440Email or call: +1-530-898-5415Join Zoom Drop-in Advising SessionOnline Request - Forms, Letters, Travel SignaturesStudent Ambassadors Want to know about student life in Chico?Email us your questions and/or set up a virtual conversation! Meet Your International Student Ambassadors(opens in new window)How do I...?Frequently asked questions by international students.Videos and PodcastsHelpful videos and podcasts for International Wildcats.Join our Global CommunityJoin the Global Student Society and apply to be an Ambassador or Global Ally.Documents and ProceduresScholarships, grants, & fee waivers, virtual resources, Chico State policies, how to get a social security number, and California driver’s licenses.Employment ResourcesOn-campus jobs, internships, work after graduation, and career preparation.International InspirationsBe inspired by International Wildcat success stories. Support Emergency Grants for International Wildcats!  Give a Gift (opens in new window)International Education & Global EngagementStudent Services Center, Room 440+1-530-898-5415iege@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/iegeDivisions of IEGEInternational AdmissionsInternational Student & Scholar ServicesStudy Abroad & ExchangeESL Support ServicesFaculty ResourcesInternational Training Programs
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
